parameters.name: Sheet
parameters.description: Sheet body that defines the profile for the temporary thickened body

parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Thickness of the temporary thickened body

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Direction in which to thicken the sheet body as defined in swThickenDirection_e

title: IModeler.ThickenSheet
signature:
Body2 ThickenSheet( 
   Body2
Sheet
,
   System.Double
Thickness
,
   System.Int32
Direction
)

parameters.name: Sheet
parameters.description: Sheet body that defines the profile for the temporary thickened body

parameters.name: Thickness
parameters.description: Thickness of the temporary thickened body

parameters.name: Direction
parameters.description: Direction in which to thicken the sheet body as defined in swThickenDirection_e

remarks: If you set Direction to swThickenDirection_Both, then the value set for Thickness is used in both directions.
